Are you aware of your rights?
How well do you know the law?
Are your current affairs up-to date?

Staying informed and aware is essential to uphold justice in society. Every citizen carries the responsibility to be vigilant and proactive in understanding their rights and legal obligations.

It is not only our responsibility, but also our duty.
